win_condition: 0) You win when the Plague team is eliminated. The Plague team cannot win with the %n alive.

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Learn if somebody has the plague
abilities.details: Plague team will always show as *not* having the plague

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Learn if somebody has the plague, and if yes, since when
abilities.details: Plague team will always show as *not* having the plague

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Learn if somebody is part of the plague team
*Passive:* Learn whenever somebody dies of the plague
*Immediate Night:* Cure somebody of the plague
abilities.details: Players in the final stage of the plague cannot be cured

abilities.basics: *Immediate Night:* Cure somebody of the plague
abilities.details: You can even cure players in the final stage of the plague

abilities.basics: *Immediate Day:* Resurrect somebody that died of the plague (once)
abilities.details: If you target didn't die of the plague, you may try again on another day.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Cannot be indirectly contaminated
*Start Phase:* Learn the number of contaminated players
*On Rodent:* Direct contamination results in death
A subject in the laboratory.
abilities.details: It is possible that a Mad Scientist doesn't exist.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Start with +2 votes on all public polls
*Passive:* Public vote counts as +2
abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as 3.

abilities.basics: *Passive:* Public vote counts as -1
abilities.details: If the %n becomes Mayor; their vote is counted as -2.

abilities.basics: *On Attack:* Escape once
*Immediate Night:* Unelect a player.
*On Death:* Attacker also dies.
*On Death:* +1 lynch for next day.
*On Death:* Election cancelled next day.
*Night Immediate:* Protect a player.
